EmailTemplate.description: Sent to customers to advise a pending action - Next steps and the timeline are provided.
EmailTemplate.name: Pending Action email template in SFDC
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Alert:(Indicate Request) Status Update - Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We noticed we still have an open case for you about an issue you raised on {!Case.CreatedDate}. Just checking in to see if you’ve had a chance to <indicate instructions given to the customer, action required from the customer>, or if you need more information to help you <indicate objective>. Please reply to this email within five (5) business days if you still need help or require more information, otherwise your case will be closed.
If you want to get in touch with us faster, try the “How can we help?” button at us.sunpower.com. Alternatively you can call us at 1-800-786-7693. We’re here for you Monday through Friday from 4 a.m. until 7 p.m. PST
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} | Customer Service Representative Global Business and Finance Services | office 1-800-786-7693 (SUNPOWER) |
